BootstrapText.Headline: There is a lot more to discover

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: To get an impression about what else is available in OpenCms, use the login box on this page to logout as "Editor" and then log in with the user name "Admin" and the password "admin". Then click the Show menu on the toolbar and select Show workplace. This will bring up the OpenCms Workplace, our "power user" interface. There you can see the internal file structure of the pages that have been created, modify permissions and maintain other system aspects.
